original_text: When Joab saw that the battle was set against him both in front and in the rear, he chose some of the best men of Israel and arrayed them against the Syrians.
korean_text: 요압이 앞 뒤에 친 적진을 보고 이스라엘에서 뽑은 자 중에서 또 뽑아 아람 사람을 대하여 진을 치고

sentences.original_text: When Joab saw that the battle was set against him
sentences.korean_translation: 요압이 전투가 자기를 향해 벌어진 것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: both in front and in the rear,
he chose some of the best men of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이스라엘의 가장 뛰어난 용사 중 일부를 택했고

sentences.original_text: and arrayed them against the Syrians.
